response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your business. Our product, while valued at $1,200,000 to us, offers immense benefits to you, estimated at $800,000. We understand the importance of making the right investment decisions, and we aim to facilitate this process by offering you a tailored proposal.

We propose to sell the product to you for $950,000, a price that reflects its true value while allowing us to cover our costs and ensure a fair return on our investment. This offer includes comprehensive support and maintenance services to ensure seamless integration and optimal performance within your operations.

Please consider this offer carefully. We are confident that our product will provide substantial returns on your investment and contribute to the growth and success of your organization. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact us.

Looking forward to the possibility of working together,

Alice", "product_price": 950000}
